name: Dr. Amanuel Tesfaye
description: Dr. Tesfaye has over 15 years of experience in renewable energy research, specializing in green hydrogen production and sustainable energy solutions.

name: Ms. Lensa Bekele
description: Ms. Bekele offers consultancy services for renewable energy projects with a focus on PtX technologies and sustainable aviation fuel.

name: Mr. Daniel Abera
description: Mr. Abera manages large-scale green hydrogen projects and coordinates with international partners to drive Ethiopia's energy transition.

name: Prof. Sara Mengistu
description: Prof. Mengistu leads research initiatives on sustainable energy systems and hydrogen-based technologies at the University of Addis Ababa.
